content:
## PonPonSnake & Assure Wallet

## Celebrate the cooperation with Assure Wallet

**We will give away 10,000 $SRC(worth 333 USDT) for 20 winners,each one can get 500 $SRC(worth 16 USDT )! And also 20 Assure PASS NFT for 20 winners!**

You will need to complete tasks to get the rewards!

**Time:** 2023-03-03  ~ 2023-03-10 （UTC+8)

**Reward:** 10,000 SRC（each winner can get 16$）+20 Assure PASS NFT * 40

**Rules:**

1.Follow [@Assure_pro](https://twitter.com/Assure_pro) on Twitter

2.Follow [@PonPonSnake_NFT](https://twitter.com/PonPonSnake_NFT) on Twitter

3.Join [PonPonSnake Global](https://t.me/PonPonSnakeEN) on Telegram

4.Download and sign [ponponsnake](https://www.ponponsnake.com) ,then submit ID

5.Proof of Work for Download Assure then submit Assure ID screenshot

6.Visit ponponsnake aspace to get red packets Website

7.Invite 1 Friend
name: PonPonSnake
